name: DEV MAN
description:
Just a game.

The world needs you to delivery their items to the mailbox. Make your way to the mailbox, don't step on the spikes! or you will restart!

Just 3 levels, its prototype, include tutorial.

A/D or Right/Left Arrow to move Horizontally

Space to Jump!

Alt + F4 to quit(U know this)

comment please!
